remarks: The functionalized Hom-set operation equals the Hom-set operation in the category of unital rings (in a universe).  (Contributed by AV, 9-Mar-2020.)
statement:
ringcbas.c $e |- C = ( RingCat ` U ) $.
ringcbas.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
ringcbas.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
ringchomfeqhom $p |- ( ph -> ( Homf ` C ) = ( Hom ` C ) ) $.
